import HomepageHeading from '../HomePageHeading/HomepageHeading'; import getWidth from '../ContainerWidth/GetWidth' import React, { Component, useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Container, Menu, Responsive, Segment, Visibility, Grid, Divider, Image, Header, Search, Icon, Dropdown, Label } from 'semantic-ui-react' import HeaderPart from '../../../HeaderSegement/HeaderPart'; import got from '../../../Images/got.png'; import ghost from '../../../Images/ghost.png'; import '../../../NewOne/Appp.css'; import vk from '../../../Images/vk.png'; import narcos from '../../../Images/narcos.png'; import MovieInfo from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/MovieInfo' import { getQueriesForElement } from '@testing-library/react'; import ImageOfRolePlayers from '../../../HeaderSegement/Explore/ImageOfRolePlayers'; import DatePicker from 'react-datepicker'; const DesktopContainer = ({ children }) => { const [fixedMenu, setFixedMenu] = useState(false); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(new Date()); const [customSize, setcustomSize] = useState(); const customSizeOfFont = () =>{ if(window.innerWidth < 1000) { setcustomSize(small); } } const FixedMenu = () => { setFixedMenu(!fixedMenu) } const options = [ { key: 1, text: 'Choice 1ddddddddddddddddddddddddd', value: 1 }, { key: 2, text: 'Choice 2', value: 2 }, { key: 3, text: 'Choice 3', value: 3 }, ] return ( FixedMenu()} onBottomPassedReverse={() => FixedMenu()}> {/* */} {/* Home Work Company */} {/* */} Reports Analytics Export Nav item Nav item again One more nav Another nav item More navigation {/* */}
